attributes.action: Return Open Access  at Stonehenge for the Summer Solstice to the spiritual people NOT party goers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
StoneHenge has Open Access  for people who wish  to attend the stones and show the respect that this great monument deserves. And to show the people that attend the same respect on a joyous occasion Litha the summer solstice.
Stonehenge wasn't built as a museum. It was built as place for people to come, for worship, to use it.
At the same token the behavior of people who freely drink to excess so they can not even walk,are abusive to others,and openly take drugs... Are ruining the atmosphere for people who truly wish to be here to mark this very special occasion.

We wish for things to change and for fellow spiritual people who will not attend due to party goers to return

We want Stonehenge to be returned to the people who wish to worship  their deities there and not use the stones as a nightclub.
That way our sacred monument will be safe for thousands of years to come.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Sacred-Monument/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
